info.name: Hidden
info.description: The Hidden widget is an invisible widget usually used in applications to carry a value so that it can be accessed in any place of an application.

key.name: father
key.desc: Nombre de su elemento padre dentro del cual se crea.

method.desc: Changes the text of the widget. This method should not be used if the widget has not been created in the user's browser with the show method.
Draws the widget in the screen, allowing to serialize the instance in the session.

arg.name: noserialize
arg.desc: Specifies whether the Hidden must be serialized or not. The default value of 0 serializes it, while a value of 1 does not.
